definition: a canal for a current of water, compete in a race
details:
noun
- a canal for a current of water
= synonyms: raceway
- a contest of speed
= example: a contest of speed
- any competition
= example: any competition
- people who are believed to belong to the same genetic stock
= example: people who are believed to belong to the same genetic stock
- (biology) a taxonomic group that is a division of a species
= synonyms: subspecies
- the flow of air that is driven backwards by an aircraft propeller
= synonyms: wash
verb
- compete in a race
= synonyms: run
- move fast
= synonyms: speed
- cause to move fast or to rush or race
= example: cause to move fast or to rush or race
= synonyms: rush
- to work as fast as possible towards a goal, sometimes in competition with others
